revised_title: Fluid Flow from Nozzles at Small Reynolds Numbers: An Alternative Approach
tldr: This article presents an alternative approach to studying the flow of fluids from nozzles at small Reynolds numbers. The authors propose a modified version of the die-swell problem that is easier to set up experimentally and is well-posed mathematically. They discuss the theoretical ideas behind this approach and describe some experiments comparing the flow of Newtonian and non-Newtonian fluids.
